mapper.update:
update rebate
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where rebate_id = #{rebateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rebate set number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where rebate_id = #{rebateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
